text: Sleeping with the Past is the 22nd studio album by Elton John and was released on 29 August 1989. It topped the album charts in New Zealand, Switzerland and the United Kingdom and made the top 30 in Australia, Austria, Canada, Denmark, France, Hungary, Germany, Italy, the Netherlands, Norway, Spain, Sweden and the United States. == Track listing == == References == Category:1989 albums Category:Elton John albums
title: Sleeping with the Past
